credentials.name: Backend API Key
credentials.description: API key for authenticating with the backend Express.js server. This key must match the N8N_API_KEY environment variable in the backend .env file.

credentials.name: WhatsApp Business API
credentials.description: Credentials for Meta WhatsApp Business Cloud API. Obtain these from the Meta for Developers dashboard.

credentials.name: OpenRouter API
credentials.description: API key for OpenRouter AI service. Obtain from https://openrouter.ai/keys. Used for intent classification, sentiment analysis, and help response generation. MUST include 'Bearer ' prefix with space.

notes.security: NEVER commit actual credentials to git. This is a template only.
notes.setup: See docs/credentials-setup.md for detailed instructions on obtaining and configuring these credentials.
notes.rotation: Rotate API keys regularly (recommended: every 90 days).
notes.storage: Actual credentials are stored securely in n8n's credential system.
